Metrics/BlockLength.description:
Description

Avoid long blocks with many lines.
Metrics/BlockLength.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

CountComments: False (type: bool)
Max: 25 (type: int)
CountAsOne: [] (type: list)
AllowedMethods: ['refine'] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
